message.entry: The input parameter must be a cell array of character vectors.
The column requires {0,number,integer} elements per row, but received {1,number,integer} instead.
Closing FITS files.
{0} does not appear to have a valid primary array or a valid header and cannot be properly closed. It was deleted.
HDU
Illegal operation on a file opened in READONLY mode.
Complex-valued key data must be either single or double precision.
Invalid FITS file pointer.
{0} cannot exceed the size of the image.
Keywords cannot be written until an HDU has been written.
Warning: CFITSIO library error ({0,number,integer}): {1}
CFITSIO library error ({0,number,integer}): {1}
Primary HDU
According to the FITS standard, the ''{0}'' keyword should not be written to the primary array.
According to the FITS standard, the ''{0}'' keyword value should be floating point.
Value for the ''{0}'' keyword should be a character vector or string scalar.
Unsupported MATLAB class ''{0}''.
Unrecognized value ({0,number,integer}).
Unhandled file mode {0,number,integer}.
Unknown CFITSIO function ''{0}''.
Unrecognized character vector or string scalar ''{0}''.
The column definition suggests a variable length field, but the input value is not a cell array.
When reading variable length column data, the FITS file must be opened in READONLY mode.
Unable to create file with specified filename. Filename might have unsupported characters.
Unable to open file. File might be corrupt or filename might have unsupported characters.
Unable to perform requested action. Filename contains unsupported characters.
FITS files do not support non-ASCII characters.
Unable to overwrite existing file. Prefix name of the file with exclamation point(!) to overwrite.
